Description:
Tbot Techno Systems, a leading IT solutions and services provider, is seeking a Manager - Enterprise Sales to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for driving sales growth by developing new business and cultivating existing client relationships within enterprise organizations. This position offers the opportunity to work with a dynamic team of professionals and lead the charge in helping businesses achieve their digital transformation goals.As a trusted partner to some of the leading brands in the industry, Tbot Techno Systems offers a diverse range of services and products, including IT hardware, networking, infrastructure solutions, and services. Our tailored IT solutions are designed to meet specific business requirements while providing cutting-edge technology that ensures affordability. We are committed to helping businesses achieve their growth and continuity goals.Develop new business opportunities and cultivate existing client relationships within enterprise organizations.
Collaborate with other business units and cross-functional teams to ensure that customer needs are met and exceeded.
Identify and qualify sales leads, maintaining a sales pipeline and meeting sales objectives.
Understand and support clients' goals and objectives and provide best-in-class solutions that address their needs.
Position and sell Tbot Techno Systems' comprehensive range of enhancements, solutions, and services.
Meet with prospective and existing customers to conduct sales calls, presentations, and demonstrations.
Represent Tbot Techno Systems at industry events and tradeshows.Job Details
